statements: UPDATE PlayerInteractionLog SET communication_log = 'First communication log' WHERE interaction_id = 1
UPDATE PlayerInteractionLog SET interaction_type = 'Login', player_id = 101, interaction_timestamp = '2022-10-15 10:30:00' WHERE interaction_id = 2
UPDATE PlayerInteractionLog SET interaction_type = 'Game End', communication_log = 'Game ended successfully' WHERE interaction_id = 101 AND player_id = 1;
UPDATE PlayerInteractionLog SET communication_log = 'Player disconnected unexpectedly', interaction_timestamp = '2023-06-15 08:30:00' WHERE player_id = 3 AND interaction_id = 105;
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_description = 'Liked the post' WHERE player_id = '6a3d898f-35c7-4fc6-a431-32b88d3fd456';
UPDATE communication_logs SET log_type = 'Error' , log_content = 'Connection timeout' WHERE log_id = 123;
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_timestamp = '2022-04-01 08:00:00', interaction_description = 'Updated Interaction Description' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE communication_logs SET log_type = 'Email', log_content = 'Updated Log Content' WHERE log_id = 100;
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_details = 'Received gift' WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE conduct_monitoring SET conduct_type = 'Violent behavior' WHERE player_id = 54321;
UPDATE communication_logs SET log_message = 'New log message', log_date = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_details = 'Updated interaction details', interaction_date = '2022-10-20 10:00:00' WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE player_info SET player_name = 'Mike' WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE communication_logs SET message = 'Reminder: Event tomorrow' WHERE player_id = 202;
UPDATE player_info SET player_name = 'John Doe', join_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE communication_logs SET message = 'Hello, this is a test message.', timestamp = '2022-03-15 08:00:00' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_sessions SET start_time = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE session_id = 101;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'John Doe', player_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_sessions SET start_time = '2022-01-01 10:00:00', end_time = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE player_id = 1 AND session_id = 5;
